mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT MEMBER_NO,MEMBER_NICKNAME,PROFILE_IMG, NVL(FRIEND_ACCEPT_FL,2) FRIEND_ACCEPT_FL, NVL(ASKING_MEMBER_NO,0) ASKING_MEMBER_NO FROM "MEMBER" LEFT JOIN (SELECT ASKED_MEMBER_NO MEMBER_NO, ASKING_MEMBER_NO, FRIEND_ACCEPT_FL FROM FRIEND WHERE ASKING_MEMBER_NO = #{loginMemberNo} UNION SELECT ASKING_MEMBER_NO MEMBER_NO, ASKING_MEMBER_NO, FRIEND_ACCEPT_FL FROM FRIEND WHERE ASKED_MEMBER_NO = #{loginMemberNo}) USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_DEL_YN = 'N' AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%${leftChoiceInput}%' AND MEMBER_NO != #{loginMemberNo} ORDER BY MEMBER_NO
